name: HopeLess (ReedlingStudios)
description:
Explore, Solve Puzzles and Help Emil.

A 3D side scroller puzzle, where inside of an asylum Hope, a Fennec Fox, tries to save his owner, Emil, to fall into darkness.

Play our new game HopeLess, solve mysterious puzzles and surround yourself with the amazing art style!

The Team:

Game Designer: Inês Duarte

Game Artists: Ricardo Monteiro, Inês Duarte

Game Developer: Duarte Susano

Social Media

If you wanna know more about us and the development of HopeLess check our social media! ^^

Twitter: @ReedlingStudios

Instagram: @reedlingstudios
